Types

Lexer = object of BaseLexer
  
LexerException = object of CatchableError
TokenKind {.pure.} = enum
  tkUnknown, tkInteger, tkFloat, tkString, tkIdentifier, tkEof, tkAmp, tkAndAnd,
  tkAnd, tkAssign, tkEq, tkAsterisk, tkAt, tkBacktick, tkBool, tkCaret, tkCase,
  tkClient, tkColon, tkComma, tkConst, tkDiscardCmd, tkDivide, tkComment, tkDoc,
  tkDot, tkEchoCmd, tkElif, tkElse, tkEnd, tkExc, tkNe, tkFn, tkFor, tkGt,
  tkGte, tkId, tkIdentVar, tkIdentVarSafe, tkIf, tkIn, tkInclude, tkLb, tkLc,
  tkLitArray, tkLitBool, tkLitFloat, tkLitFunction, tkLitInt, tkLitObject,
  tkLitString, tkLitVoid, tkLp, tkLt, tkLte, tkMinus, tkMod, tkOf, tkOr, tkPipe,
  tkOrOr, tkPlaceholder, tkPlus, tkRb, tkRc, tkReturnCmd, tkRp, tkSnippetJs,
  tkSnippetJson, tkSnippetYaml, tkTernary, tkVar, tkViewLoader, tkWhile
TokenTuple = tuple[kind: TokenKind, value: string, wsno, line, col, pos: int,
                   attr: seq[string]]
